abstract: The chip maker reported lower earnings in its first quarter, but said it expected a stronger second quarter on sales of cellphones and servers using Intel chips.
snippet: The chip maker reported lower earnings in its first quarter, but said it expected a stronger second quarter on sales of cellphones and servers using Intel chips.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — As PC makers regroup after the floods in Thailand last autumn, Intel is preparing to regain dominance of the computer chip market.

headline.main: Intel Reports Flat Revenue, but Says Growth Is Ahead
headline.print_headline: Intel Reports Flat Revenue, but Says Growth Is Ahead
